title: Aeroe Spider Front Rack
content:
Aeroe’s popular Spider Rear Rack just got a matching setup for the front of touring and commuter bikes. The Spider Front Rack ($120) works with suspension forks and acts as a pannier rack or a modular rack for Aeroe’s system bags. Let’s check it out below.

The Spider Front Rack is engineered for maximum convenience and flexibility, allowing cyclists to carry their gear securely and effortlessly on any terrain.

With a total weight of 641g, a total load capacity of 16 kgs, or 35 lbs, combined with the seamless integration of the Spider Pannier Receiver, Spider Cradle or Quick Mount Pod, solidifies Aeroe’s position as the preferred choice for MTB riders worldwide.

ETA is in August.

Features:

  • Make any MTB bike commute or adventure-ready.
  • Mix n’ match your perfect combination.
  • Made for work and play
  • Rack lets you still use your front fork suspension
  • Fit and forget

Check out more at Aeroe.
